name: Innovaspy LLC
tag_list: cell-phone-tracker, cell-phone-spyware, mobile-spy, cell-phone-spy, cell-phone-tracking, cell-phone-spy-software, track-a-cell-phone, spy-phone, spy-on-mobile, spyiphone, innovaspy
overview:
InnovaSPY is a cell phone tracking and monitoring software for iPhone and Android smartphones and tablets. This covert spy phone app offers a variety of advanced cell phone control features and an easy-to-use online account.

Innovaspy once installed on the device you will be able to monitor and record all calls made and received, real time GPS location of the mobile phone, track and record text messages (SMS), have access to the entire contacts list and media files stored on the cell phone and much more

Innovaspy provides timely messages so that everyone can keep track of the activities of employees, family, or elderly people, thus keeping them secure, making informed decisions, and providing help if needed, or just for backup own cell phone activities.
